name: Stalker
firstNightReminder: Wake up the Stalker and have them choose a player; put a Stalked reminder token on that player.
otherNightReminder: Remove any Stalked reminder tokens from players. Wake up the Stalker and have them choose a player; put a Stalked reminder token on that player.
ability: Each night, choose another living player: Until dusk, any ability that interacts with them might interact with you instead. [+0 to +1 Stalker]
